Incarnate {3}{B}{R} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Up to one target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If it would die this turn, exile it instead.
Menace
Whenever this Revelation attacks, you may cast an unincarnated copy of it. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
